text: Francis Zavier Ngannou, born 5 September 1986, is a Cameroonian mixed martial artist. He was born and raised in the village of Bati√©, Cameroon. He is competing at the heavyweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship and is the reigning Heavyweight champion. In January 2023, he does not renew his contract and therefore leaves the organization, thus leaving the belt vacant.. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Mixed martial artists Category:Cameroonian sportspeople
title: Francis Ngannou
